issue.title: [Format] Tracking for ensuring flatbuffer serialized values are aligned in stream/files.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6313](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6313). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Overall tracking bug for implementation for IPC/File format proposed by: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4951/files>

 

Implementations must support backwards compatibility with the old format (and ideally do memcopies when required to avoid undefined behavior).  Having a backwards compatible write mode is optional
